title: Catalogus plantarum in horto regio parisiis ... etc..
additional_titles: Herbae, frutices et arbores medicinales, p.1|Catalogus plantarum in horto regio parisiis, anno 1682, p.49|[Catalogue of china, glass, and small wooden and metal accessories], p.188|Catalogue de tous les medicamens simples chez Monsieur Lemery apothecaire, p.491
